Description: Cozy studio apartment in Longwood. Close to Harvard Medical School. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Laundry in the building. Heat and hot water included. Virtual tour is available. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
